quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Home Alone
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, fiction, mccallister. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Where do the McCallister family reside in the great 90s movie Home Alone?

In the movie Home Alone, when Harry (one of the burglars) comes to the house impersonating a police officer, Kevin sees him and realizes that he has seen him before robbing one of his neighbors houses. What does Kevin notice about him that makes him figure out that he is one of the burglars ?

options.text: he has one finger missing on his right hand

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a gold tooth

questions.question: Name the 1931 movie that contains the quote,  Listen to them, the children of the night. What music they make.
The following words were spoken by the character Carl Denham in which 1933 movie: Oh, no.  It wasnt the airplanes. It was Beauty killed the Beast?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: King Kong

questions.question: There were three sequels to the first Home Alone movie prior to 2003.
Which science fiction movie contains these words, spoken by Elliot: He needs to go home, hes calling his people, and I dont know where they are, and he needs to go home.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: E.T. the Extra - Terrestrial

questions.question: In this 1946 movie, set during Christmas time, Harry Bailey said the following about his brother, played by James Stewart: To my big brother George - the richest man in town!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Its a Wonderful Life

questions.question: What actor delivered this roguish line in a noted Civil War movie that premiered in 1939?  ...and you Miss, are no lady.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Clark Gable

questions.question: What is the name of Kevin McCallisters wise cracking brother in the movie Home Alone?
This line was spoken by actress Clara Blandick in which 1939 motion picture: Now you go feed those hogs before they worry themselves into anemia.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Wizard of Oz

questions.question: This 1967 film starred Dustin Hoffman who asked the question: Mrs. Robinson, youre trying to seduce me. Arent you?.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Graduate

questions.question: Robert DeNiro and Danny DeVito were first considered for the roles of burglars Harry and Marv in the hilarious movie Home Alone.
What is the nickname of burglars Marv and Harry in the movie Home Alone?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Wet Bandits

questions.question: In the movie Home Alone, Kevins brother had a pet tarantula. What was its name?
In the movie Home Alone, what is the name of Kevins neighbor, the elderly man, who is allegedly a murderer called The South Bend Shovel Slayer?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Pirates and Caribbean
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, johny. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This fictional character from Pirates of the Caribbean made the following statement: I make a point of avoiding familiarity with pirates.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Will Turner

questions.question: In Pirates of the Caribbean, Jack Sparrow intended to pick up a crew in Tortuga.
Actor Joaquin Phoenix, who portrays singer Johnny Cash, does all his own singing in the film.
Singer Johnny Cash was very close to his older brother Jack, who died in an accident involving what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Table Saw

questions.question: This ship, featured in Pirates of the Caribbean, is the next fastest in the Caribbean after the mystic Black Pear.
Grenada is the real name of the island on which Pirates of the Caribbean was filmed.
Which character from Pirates of the Caribbean said the following words: What do you say to three schillings, and we forget the name??
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jack Sparrow

questions.question: Did the movie Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl come out in 2003?
What is the birth name of singer Johnny Cash, whose life is depicted in the movie Walk the Line?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: J. R. Cash

questions.question: The movie Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl was directed by Gore Verbinski and produced by Jerry Bruckheimer.
Early on in the movie Walk the Line Johnny Cash enlists in what branch of the military?
Before marrying June Carter, singer Johny Cash was married to whom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vivian Cash

questions.question: While in the military, Johnny Cash is inspired by a film about a prison and its inmates and composes what famous song?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Folsom Prison Blues

questions.question: These words were delivered by Scottish national hero William Wallace, who was featured in what 1995 movie: Aye, fight and you may die, run, and youll live ...   at least for awhile.?
What is the name of the place in which the main characters of Pirates of the Caribbean live?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Port Royal

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Film and Line
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, myers, carter. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the Hellraiser series, in order for Pinhead to be summoned, one should do what?

options.text: dial a 7-digit number and say “I call you! Come now!”
spell out his name five times in front of a mirror
break the spell that keeps him in Hell

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: open a puzzle box

questions.question: Is it true that singer June Carter worked side by side with Reese Witherspoon, who portrayed her in Walk the Line, helping the actress to perfect the role.
In the film Walk the Line, a record executive says to Johny Cash, Whats with the black? You look like you are going to a funeral. What does Johny reply?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maybe I Am

questions.question: This doctor who can communicate with animals is portrayed by Eddie Murphy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dr. Dolitte

questions.question: Dr. Hannibal Lecter aids Clarice Starling in finding serial killer Buffalo Bill in which 1991 movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Silence of the Lambs

questions.question: In the film Walk the Line, the part of Cashs long-time friend, Waylon Jennings was played by Jennings  son in real life. What is his name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shooter Jennings

questions.question: In “Scream”, what were the words that Billy spoke right before shooting Randy and revealing himself as one of the killers?

options.text: We all go a little mad sometimes.
Boy, do I have a surprise for you!
I told you I have a surprise for you.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: We all go a little mad sometimes.

questions.question: In the movie “Bride of Chucky”, the fourth of the Child’s Play series, Chucky’s girlfriend Tiffany brings Chucky back using what book about voodoo magic?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Voodoo 4 Dummies

questions.question: Freddy Krueger, the villain in “A Nightmare on Elm Street”, was named after which of these?

options.text: a carpenter who killed his entire family
the first names of a couple of  burglars

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a bully

questions.question: “The Exorcist”, rated as the scariest movie of all time, is burlesqued in which part of  “Scary Movie”?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scary Movie 2

questions.question: In this comedy - horror film, Dr. Everett Von Scott is a scientist who rivals Dr. Frank-N-Furter.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Rocky Horror Picture Show

questions.question: In this 1978 film, Doctor Sam Loomis is the psychiatrist who takes care of Michael Myers at Smiths Grove-Warren County Sanitarium in Illinois.
In this 1968 film Maurice Evans portrays Dr. Zaius who thinks all humans must be exterminated.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Planet of the Apes

questions.question: Nigel Bruce portrayed Dr. Watson in what 1939 film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes

questions.question: Michael Myers, the psychopath from the Halloween series, wears a mask. The first mask he wore was actually a misshaped mask of  a famous character in a show. Who is the character and  what is the name of the show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Captain Kirk, “Star Trek”

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Saturday Night Fever
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, saturday, jason. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In Saturday Night Fever, this actress portrayed the aloof Stephanie Mangano, who after much urging, agreed to be Tony Maneros partner in a dance competition.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Karen Gorney

questions.question: In Saturday Night Fever, Tony Manero and his friends go dancing in order to escape from the harsh reality of life. What is the name of the disco club they visit every Saturday night?
What was the name of Tony Maneros brother, portrayed by actor Martin Shakar in the movie Saturday Night Fever?
Who directed the 1980 movie “The Shining”, based on a Stephen King novel and starring Jack Nicholson?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stanley Kubrick

questions.question: Saturday Night Fever, a movie about the troubled Brooklyn youth, Toni Manero, helped to popularize disco music. In what year did the movie come out?
Which of the following is not a horror movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gods and Monsters

questions.question: In the movie Saturday Night Fever, Toni Manero was the indisputable king at the disco, where he forgot about his dead-end job. What did Tony actually do for a living?

options.text: He worked in a paint store.
He worked in a Pizza Parlor.
He worked as a dance instructor.
He was a stock boy at the local AP

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He worked in a paint store.

questions.question: In Saturday Night Fever, this character, portrayed by Barry Miller, fell off the bridge and died.

This English born director had worked for television for years before his breakthrough with Saturday Night Fever. His filmography includes movies such as, Dracula, Point of No Return and Brothers Keeper.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Badham

questions.question: Jewish American actress Fran Drescher, famous for her nasal New York accent, played in the movie Saturday Night Fever.
Tony Manero, the main character in the movie Saturday Night Fever, had posters of which actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Al Pacino

questions.question: What is Andrews last name in the movie The Breakfast Club?
How does prom queen Helen Shivers die in the 1997 blockbuster “I Know What You Did Last Summer”?

options.text: She gets hit by a car

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She is hooked to death

questions.question: In the movie Saturday Night Fever, Tony Manero and his friends from Bay Ridge, Brooklyn, climbed along the parapets of which bridge?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Verrazano Narrows Bridge

questions.question: Jason Voorhees, the main character in Friday the 13th series puts on a mask to hide his horrible face in which movie?

options.text: Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Friday the 13th Part 3

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Academy Awards
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, saturday, none. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: How many students had to spend their Saturday in detention in the movie The Breakfast Club?
Which 1987 movie won the Best Picture Award?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Last Emperor

questions.question: This war movie was the first movie to win the  Academy Award for Best Picture.
Why did Brian get a Saturday detention in the film The Breakfast Club?

options.text: He was going to kill himself

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was going to kill himself

questions.question: Which 1997  movie was nominated for 14 Academy Awards?

In the movie the Breakfast Club the following words were said by Andrew: Dear Mr. Vernon, we accept the fact that we had to sacrifice a whole Saturday in detention for whatever it was we did wrong. But we think youre crazy to make us write an essay telling you who we think we are.
Which of these Westerns won 7 Academy Awards?

options.text: The Good, The Bad , and the Ugly

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dances with Wolves

questions.question: In the film The Breakfast Club, Allison gives Bender one of her diamond earrings.
Which British movie won 8 Oscars?
In the movie The Breakfast Club, Claire Standish is played by Ally Sheedy.
Which movie adaptation of a Broadway musical won eleven Academy Awards?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: West Side Story

questions.question: Which one of these movies did not win 10 Academy Awards?

options.text: The Lord of the Rings: The return of the King

questions.question: What year did the movie The Breakfast Club come out?
The movie The Breakfast Club was rated PG-13.
Which two movies have been nominated for 11 Academy Awards but won none?

options.text: Quo Vadis and The Nuns Story
Peyton Place and The Sand Pebbles
The Color Purple and The Turning Point

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Color Purple and The Turning Point

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Rings and Lord
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, rulers, awards. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This 1972 musical won 8 Academy Awards but not the Best Picture Award.
In the The Fellowship of the Ring movie, what is the name of Sams crush?
What was Gollums real name before he became obsessed with the idea of having the One Ring?
Whose rulers wife dies giving birth to their son Theodred in Lord of the Rings?
In Lord of the Rings, which of these is a son of Denethor II, the twenty-sixth and last Ruling Steward of Gondor?
In Lord of the Rings, what was the name of the bread given by the Elves to the Fellowship?
In Star Wars: A New Hope, who was R2-D2 and C-3POs original master?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Princess Leia

questions.question: This movie won Oscars for Best Picture, Best Original Screenplay and Best Editing at the 78th Academy Awards.
How many rings were given to humans by Sauron in Lord of the Rings?
In Star Wars Princess Leia is being held at what block on the Death Star?
Approximately how many Orcs participate in the battle of Helms Deep in the movie Lord of the Rings?
In Lord of the Rings, what is Boromir’s younger brother’s name?
Which character on Star Wars said No blasters! No blasters!?
What was the race of humans that fought against the Fellowship and their Allies in Lord of the Rings?
Which of these is a name of a location in the Lord of the Rings films that translates Pass of the Spider?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cirith Ungol
